itemDisplayName: Azure Docker DataCenter Templates for new DDC
description: Azure Docker DataCenter Templates for the to-be GAed Docker DataCenter with ucp:2.0.0-Beta1 (native Swarm with Raft) and dtr:2.1.0-Beta1 Azure initially based on the
Docker DataCenter 1.x Azure MarketPlace Gallery Templates (1.0.9). http://azure.github.io/azure-dockerdatacenter/
summary: Azure Docker DataCenter Templates for the to-be GAed Docker DataCenter with swarm mode native
